overview_of_class: Techniques for coordinating decisions and actions of various parties in the design and construction of civil and environmental engineering projects. Delivery systems; preconstruction services; project planning; cost control and value engineering; bidding.
name: Construction Management
title: MEAS CIV_ENV 330-0-01 Construction Management

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Techniques for coordinating decisions and actions of various parties in the design and construction of civil and environmental engineering projects. Delivery systems; preconstruction services; project planning; cost control and value engineering; bidding.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value:
1) Recognize the variety of delivery systems for construction projects.
2) Differentiate the construction manager's role during preconstruction and estimating process.
3) Examination of the bidding versus quality-based selection process for procurement of work by construction management firms.
4) Differentiation of the various types of schedules used in construction.
5) Contrast the roles and responsibilities and the interactions of design professionals and construction professionals to construct a project.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value: Alison Dykstra, Construction Project Management, First Edition.
